title: Moving Average Calculation Function Block
name: LGF_FloatingAverage
description: This function calculates a moving arithmetic mean value from REAL values.

input.name: cyclicExecution
input.description: TRUE: cyclic operation, trigger not in use

input.name: trigger
input.description: Read in `value` with every pulse at input `trigger`

input.name: value
input.description: Value/s from which the moving average is to be determined.

input.name: windowSize
input.description: Window length for sliding averaging in the range from 1..100. The standard value is 100.

input.name: reset
input.description: TRUE: The block is reset and the calculation starts again.

output.name: windowSizeReached
output.description: FALSE: Maximum window width not yet reached, TRUE: Maximum window width reached

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error, TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB and error identification.
